properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:34AM EST until January 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
...Some Icing is likely Tonight into the day on Sunday...

.Rain will transition to freezing rain, and may become mixed with
sleet or snow, late tonight into Sunday morning for portions of
far northern New Hampshire through central and midcoast Maine. The
freezing rain could produce ice accretions of up to a third of an
inch.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations
of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one quarter of
an inch expected.

* WHERE...In New Hampshire, Southern Coos County. In Maine,
Southern Oxford and Androscoggin Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Scattered power outages are possible. Plan on
slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY
